name: Banda Sashank
bio: A B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering student at Vellore Institute of Technology, Chennai.

about.intro: I am an enthusiastic and motivated computer science and engineering student with a strong passion for technology. My academic journey has provided me with a solid foundation in programming and software development. I am always looking for opportunities to apply my skills to real-world problems and contribute to innovative projects.
about.expertise: My technical expertise spans across various domains, from full-stack development to mobile applications. I am particularly interested in AI and machine learning applications, having developed projects using tools like OpenAI Whisper and GROQ APIs. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy leading teams to create engaging content and effective solutions.

projects.title: Speak to Learn â€“ Turn Audio into Smart Study Material
projects.description: I built this project during my internship at SASNEVI. It takes spoken audio, turns it into a PDF, and uploads it to an AI tool. Users can ask questions or get multiple-choice quizzes based on the content. It helps make learning from audio easier and more interactive.

projects.title: YouTube Auto Uploader
projects.description: Built an automated uploader to schedule and publish videos to YouTube using the YouTube Data API. Prevents duplicate uploads by verifying filenames against existing video titles.

projects.title: Audio to Text PDF Converter
projects.description: A full-stack app to convert audio files to text using OpenAI Whisper with real-time transcription. Features live SSE updates, progress bars, and PDF generation post transcription.

projects.title: QueryPDF (AI PDF Question Answering)
projects.description: Developed a tool to query PDF content using LLMs via GROQ and Google APIs. Supports secure API-based interaction, a modular Flask backend, and a React frontend.

projects.title: Audio to Text PDF to query solver
projects.description: Intenship: Contributed to a client project at SASNEVI Startup Company by developing a tool to convert audio to text and generate PDFs. This was part of a larger project including a Query PDF Bot.
